title: GO programming lang with Solaris
body:
by **ask.sanket**: 
Hi,

This just a info call...

I jst want to understand that How much is this language compatibile with 
Shell Scripting & PERL. Also,as per info on ur site GO is not compatible 
for use with UNIX/SOLARIS.

Kindly clear the doubts.

Thanks & Regards,
Sanket Bhargava
